ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 36
ygData.msgSnippet: as far as what the sketches sell to the merchant for i dont know....the actual pie tins still sell for the same amount. as far as the clay and stuff no...the
ygData.messageBody:
as far as what the sketches sell to the merchant for i dont know....the
actual pie tins still sell for the same amount.
as far as the clay and stuff no...the only things that have seemed to
increase in price are the pt sketches i tested

Eric
-----Original Message-----
From: David Harrell <pokes@...>
To: EQ_Potters@onelist.com <EQ_Potters@onelist.com>; embroidery@...
<embroidery@...>
Date: Monday, July 26, 1999 4:09 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Potters] Digest Number 36


>From: "David Harrell" <pokes@...>
>
>Ok Eric, two questions. First, what does a sketch sell for to a merchant?
>Secondly, has there been any adjustment to the other items such as clay and
>firing sheets? These are important questions that will dictate my actions
>this evening.
>
>dwh
>----- Original Message -----

pie

to

lucky...

Surprise
